body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jason Peterson and the customer's name is Janice Diaz.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Corp Customer Service. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I'm having some issues with my order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I please have your name to look up your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Jane Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. Could I have your order number to help speed up the process?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Could you also provide me with the email address associated with the order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. I’ve found your order. I see that there was an issue with shipping. I will get this resolved for you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Thank you for your time, Jane. Have a great day!
